references.paper_title: Phi-3 technical report: A highly capable language model locally on your phone
references.reason: This work introduces the Phi-3 family of language models, which demonstrates state-of-the-art performance on a variety of tasks, indicating its importance as a backbone model for GUI agents.

references.paper_title: Navigating the digital world as humans do: Universal visual grounding for GUI agents
references.reason: This study introduces UGround, a universal visual grounding method for GUI agents, providing the crucial ability to understand and interact with visual elements in a human-like manner.

references.paper_title: Mind2web: Towards a generalist agent for the web
references.reason: This work introduces Mind2Web, a dataset and benchmark for developing web agents, important for evaluating the agent's ability to follow instructions and complete tasks on real-world websites.

references.paper_title: Android-world: A dynamic benchmarking environment for autonomous agents
references.reason: This paper introduces AndroidWorld, a dynamic benchmarking environment for autonomous agents in Android environments, which serves as one of the primary testbeds for evaluating the effectiveness of the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Webarena: A realistic web environment for building autonomous agents
references.reason: This study introduces WebArena, a realistic web environment for building autonomous agents, serving as one of the main testbeds for evaluating the generalization of the proposed mid-training approach.
